requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP1+
  • Processor: Any X86 CPU with SSE2 instruction set support (i3+ or amd)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Any X86 CPU with SSE2 instruction set support (i3+ or amd)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
